# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that specifies whether the drag interaction responds to touches and is allowed to participate in a drag activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Enabling the interactions

- **isEnabledByDefault**: A device-dependent Boolean value that indicates whether a newly-instantiated drag interaction is allowed to participate in a drag activity.
